objects.text: 925 Sterling Silver Pink Drop Wreath Earrings
Premium Quality • 6-Month Warranty • Certificate of Authenticity

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 67 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features an elegant and feminine design suitable for showcasing premium jewelry. The background consists of soft radial and linear gradients in rose and blush tones, overlaid with translucent decorative circles and curved line motifs that add depth and sophistication. At the center, a high-quality product image ("product_image") of rose gold earrings is prominently displayed. The headline ("heading") uses bold uppercase typography in a deep rose shade, immediately grabbing attention. Below it, the subheading ("subheading") in a refined serif font complements the luxury tone. The "description" line emphasizes quality and trust elements. The price ("price") is clearly highlighted and supported by a call-to-action button ("cta_button") with bold white text ("cta"). 

**Color Palette**:
- Soft Blush Pink (#FFF0F5)
- Light Rose (#FFD1DC)
- Rose Gold Gradient (#F5A9B8, #E6A3B7)
- Deep Rose Text (#9A4E5F)
- Mauve Pink Button (#BE5F77)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features elegant circular earrings highlighted by a delicate color palette of soft pink and shimmering white, blended with rose gold tones. The earrings primarily use a **soft blush pink (#F9C6D0)** for the petal shapes, complemented by a **rose gold metallic finish (#E3888A)** seen along the structure. Sparkling white gems with icy undertones (**crystal white #F5F5F5**) contrast beautifully against the warm colors, bringing lightness and brilliance. The subtle gradient between blush and rose gold offers a gentle transition, making the gems pop while blending harmoniously. These colors evoke luxury, femininity, and sophistication, ideal for a stylish, elegant banner design.
